questionsAndAnswers.question: Hi Dear, How may I help you?

answers.answer: I want to get admission in University.
I want to know what programs this university is offering.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How can I help you about your admission?

answers.answer: I want to know what programs you guys offering.
I want to know fees structure.
What perks this university offers over others.
I know in what department I want the admission, let me know how to get started.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Fill this form and we will contact you shortly about it.
Let me know in which program are you interested.
Ok, If you need any help in the future let me know, I will be here to help you anytime. until then take care.
We offer counselor for free of cosl who can help you in case of your career and education.
We are working on this feature, we will let you know as we get the chance.
